Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

Class ChallengeScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.ChallengeScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
LineClearedListener, NextPieceListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiplayerScene
public class ChallengeScene extends BaseScene implements NextPieceListener, LineClearedListener
The Single Player challenge scene. Holds the UI for the single player challenge mode in the game.
